com.apusplay.sdk.pay

接口 Purchase


  • public interface Purchase
    Represents an in-app billing purchase Order.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      String getExtraPayload()
      The payload for the purchase order
      String getItemType()
      The type of the item to purchase
      String getOrderId()
      Purchase Order id
      String getOriginalJson()
      The original pruchase order data in Json format.
      int getPurchaseState()
      The status of the purchase order
      long getPurchaseTime()
      The exact time to purchase the item
      String getSignature()
      The signature of the purchase order
      String getSku()
      The SKU(Stock Keeping Unit) id
      String getToken()
      The purchase token
      boolean isAutoRenewing()
      Only Periodic subscription item has such attribute.
      boolean isConsumable()
      If the item purchased is consumable.
